source_dataset_name.description: The name of the dataset being used from the source. This typically matches the 'dataset' value found in a record's sources column.

inception_date.description: The first date this source was used in the Overture addresses theme, in YYYY-MM-DD format.

url.description: The home page of this source.

url_archived.description: Archived version of the home page.

data_url.description: The data page or data portal of this source, typically includes links to data downloads and license links.

data_url_archived.description: Archived version of the landing page URL.

data_download_url.description: A direct download link of address data from this source, typically a geo-format or compressed file.

license_url.description: A link to this source's data license or page referencing the associated license.

license_url_archived.description: Archived version of the license URL.

license_type.description: The license that data from this source falls under (e.g. CC0 1.0, CC BY 4.0, Open Data License).

license_text.description: Relevant license text, direct from the license URL.

license_attribution.description: Any required attribution required by this source.

countries.description: Name of the countries which is covered in the source data.

coverage_description.description: A description of the coverage type of the source data - i.e. national, regional, local.

data_layer_name.description: Name of the data layer used from this source.

oa_path.description: File path and name in OpenAddresses, if existing.

address_levels.description: Available address level attributes from OpenAddress, if existing.

file_format.description: Format of the file used from this source.

coverage_bbox.description: The bounding box, in [xmin, ymin, xmax, ymax] format, of this source's coverage

update_frequency.description: How frequently the source data is updated.

known_issues.description: A description of any issues with the data that are known - i.e. data is incomplete, records are incomplete, coverage is incomplete, etc.

notes.description: Freeform notes about this data source, including notes on any pre-processing requirements.
